titleStmt.title: Mock songs and joking poems, all novel consisting of mocks to several late songs about the town : with other new songs and ingenious poems much in use at court, and both theaters / by the author of Westminster drollery.
titleStmt.author: Author of Westminster drollery.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
Signature A is incomplete and pages 133-134 are torn in the filmed copy. Beginning-page 59 and pages 130-end photographed from Bodleian Library copy, and inserted at the end.
